attributes.action: Do not ban trail hunting, We don’t follow real scents
attributes.additional_details: Stop the ban of trail hunting
attributes.background: Stop the ban on trail hunting, it’s unfair on the young and experienced riders, who want to take there horses out, either for the first time or the 100th. People see it as following a real fox but we don’t.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Stop the ban on trail hunting" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/755123
